thread.title: Quintessential British Experience
thread.title_full: Quintessential British Experience - Review of St. Pancras Renaissance Hotel London, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: tamiaira
title: Quintessential British Experience
text: I find myself returning to the St Pancras every time I'm in London. I've stayed in the full range of rooms: everything from the standard Barlow Wing rooms to the suites in the Chambers Wing (with access to the Chambers club). I love the d√©cor.... it captures the grandeur of a different age but with the modern amenities that make it an extremely comfortable hotel. Don't hesitate to book here! (And if you can afford the splurge, stay at least one night in the Chambers wing for a completely different experience).
